original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū daṇḍapāṇissa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū daṇḍapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na daṇḍa pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na daṇḍa pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca daṇḍa pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
